query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Old English.
19 I’ vedea lei, ma non vedëa in essa 20 mai che le bolle che ’l bollor levava, 21 e gonfiar tutta, e riseder compressa.

query.result: 19 Ic ða geseah ða ðæt wif, ac ðær ne geseah 20 naht ðæs butan ða blegan ðe ðæt weallende water awearp, 21 and eall hire lichoman wearð abulgen, and eft ða samod asetl.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Old English.

query.result: 22 Þa ic ðær niðer staðolfæste beheold, 23 min latteow ða cwæð: "Loca, loca!", 24 and me of ðære stowe ðær ic stod bræc.

query.result: 28 ðæt he for ðære fyrhte ne mæg ðone fleam gehealdan: 29 and ic ða æfter us geseah ðone deofol sweartne 30 hrinan ofer ðone hlið.

query.result: 55 Ne læsseð coci his cnapan oððe his hyran 56 flæsc on ðam weallende wætere wyllan, 57 mid ðam tangum, þæt hit ne gæle.

query.result: 100 And ða bogas hi abugon and cwædon him betwux him, 101 "Wilt ðu ðæt he hit on ðam hrycge hrepsie?" 102 And ða andwyrdon hi and cwædon, "Do swa ðæt he hit wel gefæle."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Old English.
103 Ma quel demonio che tenea sermone 104 col duca mio, si volse tutto presto 105 e disse: «Posa, posa, Scarmiglione!».
query.error: **English:** 103 But that demon who was speaking 104 with my guide, turned around very quickly 105 and said: "Stop, stop, Scarmiglione!".
query.result: 103 Ac se deofol ðe ðær ðone dom ahof 104 wið ðone heretogan min, he hine hraðe bewende 105 and cwæð: "Bide, bide, Scermingle!".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Old English.

query.result: 106 Þa cwæð he to us: "Furðor gangan ðurh ðisne 107 cleof ne mæg man, forðan ðe ðær ligeð 108 eal tobrocen ðæs sextan bogan."

109 E se l’andare avante pur vi piace, 110 andatevene su per questa grotta; 111 presso è un altro scoglio che via face.

query.error: **English:** 112 Yesterday, more than five hours after this hour, 113 one thousand two hundred and sixty-six 114 years were completed since the way was broken here.
query.result: 112 Gistran, ma þonne fif and fiftig wintra 113 and þusend and twa hund wintra and sexty 114 wæron agane ða ðeos weg gewearð.

130 Se tu se’ sì accorto come suoli, 131 non vedi tu ch’e’ digrignan li denti 132 e con le ciglia ne minaccian duoli?».
